/* 2023.09.24 수정중... SQL ID : TLOPageSQL.doCountCorporates 기업 카운트 */
select COUNT(*) from techdemand_corporate tc left outer join tblmember t on tc.member_seqno::INT = t.member_seqno left outer join tblbusiness b on t.biz_name = b.biz_name where b.biz_name = #{biz_name}

/* 키워드 검색 2023.09.15 SQL ID : CoTechDemandSQL.doAutoSearchKeyword */
select tc.code_name from tbtech_code tc where tc.code_name like '%${code_name}%' group by tc.code_key;

/* 지금 로그인한 기업 멤버아이디의 session 중 biz_name과 같은 tblmember.biz_name과 같은 tblmember.member_seqno를 찾아와야된다. CoTechDemandSQL.getTLOSeq_no 2023.09.23 SQL ID : CoTechDemandSQL.getTLOSeqNo TBLMEMBER의 MEMBER_SEQNO = 3 */
SELECT MEMBER_SEQNO FROM TBLMEMBER T WHERE T.BIZ_NAME = #{biz_name} AND T.MEMBER_TYPE = 'TLO'
